between rides we would stop for a snack .

before we left | we had to take a few more pictures of location location .
output.sentences: Finally it was time to go on our family vacation!
We had to wait in long lines at the theme parks due to the fact that a large organization decided to take their employees to the park the same day.
Long lines not being that fun, we decided to stop riding rides for a bit and enjoyed a snack instead.
Because we chose to take a break from the rides we got a chance to do other cool things like dress up as pirates.
Before we left we found the best location to take our last pictures.
